title: 10x Order Volume Scale
challenge: E-commerce platform struggling to handle growth from 100 to 1,000+ daily orders. Manual processes causing delays and customer complaints.
solution: Implemented automated order processing, inventory management system, and customer communication workflows using Shopify Plus and custom integrations.
impact: Enabled the client to handle Black Friday traffic 10x higher than previous year without system failures. Revenue increased 1200% while maintaining operational efficiency.
testimonial: The scalability improvements were game-changing. We handled our biggest sales day ever without a single system hiccup.

title: CSAT Transformation
challenge: Customer satisfaction scores declining, high support ticket volume, and team burnout from manual processes.
solution: Redesigned customer success workflows, implemented proactive monitoring, created self-service resources, and trained team on new processes.
impact: Reduced customer churn rate by 18% and increased upsell opportunities by 25%. Team satisfaction improved significantly with reduced workload.
testimonial: Our team went from reactive firefighting to proactive customer success. The transformation was remarkable.

title: Portfolio Optimization
challenge: Managing 200+ properties with inefficient processes, high maintenance costs, and occupancy issues.
solution: Implemented property management software, optimized maintenance workflows, created tenant communication systems, and developed data-driven pricing strategies.

metrics.label: Maintenance cost reduction
metrics.description: Through preventive maintenance and vendor optimization

impact: Increased net operating income by 22% across the entire property portfolio. Tenant satisfaction improved significantly with better communication and faster resolution times.
testimonial: The operational improvements transformed how we manage our entire portfolio. Both efficiency and profitability increased dramatically.
